text: new subdivision labor protective legislation family and medical leave benefits for amend rsa by inserting after section the following new section family and medical leave benefits for family and medical leave benefits for the provisions of the federal family and medical leave act of u s section shall be extended to all employees of employers with at least or more employees for any employee in quarantine covered family member in quarantine or covered family member sent home from school or child care for coronavirus or or for a related reason as directed by a medical provider or under government direction this section shall not apply to individual instances in which the commissioner determines there to be an economic hardship
